Hero.header:
Build Quality Software
Optimize Your Workflow
Hero.description: We believe that software should do more than just function, it should inspire progress

Services.description: Discover tailored solutions designed to meet your unique needs. From custom software development to system integration, our services empower your business with innovative technology and seamless execution

Benefit.description: We are guided by the principle that every solution we build must embody quality, collaboration, and purpose.

item.title: Commitment to Quality
item.description: We’re driven by the belief that true quality is achieved through dedication and attention to detail. Every software development project is a testament to our pursuit of excellence

item.title: Credible Experience
item.description: With diverse portfolio, our software development services are grounded in a deep understanding of the unique challenges each sector faces. We don’t just deliver solutions; we listen, we learn, and we craft what truly matters

item.title: Collaborative Approach
item.description: Your vision guides our process. We take the time to understand your needs, ensuring our solutions not only meet expectations but also elevate your goals to new heights

item.title: Continous Support
item.description: We view every project as the start of a long-term relationship. Our work doesn’t end with deployment; we stay by your side with guarantee maintenance, ensuring your application development project continues to perform optimally

Vision.description: We are here to empower organizations to unlock their potential by transforming visionary ideas into impactful and sustainable digital solutions. We strive to be a trusted partner in delivering custom software applications that drive growth, optimize workflows, and support innovation.

item.title: Discuss The Project
item.description: Discussion of the project and collection of information on requirements and supporting data.

item.title: Research & Analysis
item.description: The process of requirements analysis, finding solutions, creating concept plans and application creation strategies.

item.title: Concept Submission
item.description: The process of submitting plans and concept designs for applications that have been created to clients.

item.title: Prototype
item.description: The process of creating a prototype or initial design of an application such as application design and system design.

item.title: Development
item.description: The process of creating and developing applications from prototypes and designs that have been created.

item.title: Testing
item.description: The process of rechecking and testing to ensure the application's functionality can run perfectly.

item.title: Pre Deployment
item.description: The process of carried out in preparation for the deployment process.

item.title: Deployment
item.description: The application installation process on the server and user. And the application is ready to use.

item.title: Maintenance Warranty
item.description: Ensures the application continues to function properly, fixes any bugs found, and provides technical support to users during the warranty period.

item.title: Finish
item.description: The final stage where the application project is declared complete, the application will be fully handed over to the client.

sector.description:
PT. OQB Software House is a professional software house that offers trusted digital solutions. Realize business efficiency with the best services with innovative technology.

We empower organizations to unlock their potential by transforming visionary ideas into impactful digital solutions and impactful and sustainable digital solutions. We strive to be a trusted partner in delivering custom software applications that drive growth, optimize workflows, and support innovation.

Hero.description: Discover the latest trends, tutorials, case studies, and strategies to drive your business and technology forward
Reach out to OQB today and let’s discuss how we can bring your ideas to life

Testimony.description: Every project is more than just a task; it’s a partnership built on trust, collaboration, and shared goals. Their testimonials speak to the quality of our work and the strength of our relationships.

item.message: Our new web application allows students to keep up with their studies even when they can’t be in class. The blended learning approach really keeps students engaged, and teachers love how easy it is to share materials and assignments
item.name: Mulki Siti Hajar Rezaini, M.Pd.
item.position: Teacher at Senior High School 3 in Serang City

item.message: The application developed precisely meets the partner’s needs. The project was swiftly completed. Good job!
item.name: Anggoro Suryo Pramudyo, M.Kom.

item.message: I hope we can work together again on future projects
item.name: Danik Mulya Sari, S.Pd.Si.

item.message: The performance is great! The results are just what I needed
item.name: Dicky Lumena

ContactForm.description: We are ready to provide solutions and look forward to discussing how we can help
